verses.name: Ezekiel 43:14
verses.text: And from the bottom upon the ground even to the lower settle shall be two cubits, and the breadth one cubit; and from the lesser settle even to the greater settle shall be four cubits, and the breadth one cubit.

verses.name: Ezekiel 43:15
verses.text: So the altar shall be four cubits; and from the altar and upward shall be four horns.

verses.name: Ezekiel 43:16
verses.text: And the altar shall be twelve cubits long, twelve broad, square in the four squares thereof.
